body.name: Breville The Mesh Baskets for The Smart Oven Air
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery February 15 - 16. Order within 20 hrs 38 mins.
features: For use with The Smart Oven Air
Designed for air frying or dehydrating multiple batches of ingredients
body.description: Cook multiple batches of food quickly and easily with these Mesh Baskets from Breville. They are made for use with the Breville Smart Oven Air. Three baskets are included. These baskets are designed for air frying or dehydrating multiple batches of ingredients. You can cook up to three batches at a time. Even better, they are top rack dishwasher safe for easy clean up.16-1/2" L x 12-1/4" W x 1-1/4" H

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth it, but jury is out on the longevity
reviews.reviewText: In the smart air fry pro only the top 2 racks do a decent job at air frying due to where the fan is placed. Dehydrating, however, I can dehydrate effectively on any rack. It is worth it to have extra racks to have another 2 racks of fries ready to go in when the other 2 are done, though.I heard that there is a finish on the rail bars thagoes away over time. I tried taking a razor to one and cutting the finish, and indeed it is not a solid piece of metal, but metal with a shiny finish on it. So it may not be buy it for life quality, which is unfortunate. These will flake off over time just with the heating and cooling of the metal much like teflon would. How long that'll I can't be certain. The wire on it, though appears to be solid, so at least when does happen it'll still be usable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality Breville product.
reviews.reviewText: Packed perfectly and on time. lso a great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars love this Berville air fryer
reviews.reviewText: love my Breville. What it does for salmon is change it from a food I forced myself to eat to a food I LOVE. and these trays are what I need so while one is in the sink, can use another. awesome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Breville products are high quality
reviews.reviewText: It is important to have extras of these baskets for more servings..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Factory originals love having extras
reviews.reviewText: Nice to have extra basket trays for doing dehydration or multiple cooking racks. OEM originals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Genuine Breville product
reviews.reviewText: These are definitely genuine Breville products and the three pack is nice because they are not easy to clean with all their nooks and crannies, and this causes them to rust over time with water sitting in little crevices and corners despite thinking you've got it completely dry. Their air fryers are top notch, though, so it's worth it to deal with these little inconveniences.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I don't know if anyone has included that these wash beautifully in the top rack of the dishwasher! Very durable and have some heft to them.

reviews.reviewTitle: How does one get to the top of the oven to clean?
reviews.reviewText: I do find the oven itself cooks very well and interior is easy to clean except for the inside top. I particularly like the light inside and the option to turn it on at any time. Also the air fryer cooks fabulously. Like that a 9 x 13 pan can be used as well as muffin tray. Bakes very well.Also like adding more trays and that the dehydrator can be used well. Think a whole chicken and a roast spatters too much so clean up is time consuming. Would use my self clean oven for that. The Breville toaster oven and air fryer is a wonderful addition to my kitchen. I have used it daily and am completely satisfied with the options it presents.

These are excellent. There are no issues with them.What I do have issue with is Breville's ridiculous pricing / availability, which I consider a bit of a scam. If you go to their website, one of these is $19. Three of them is $70. So they charge you $10 more than if you bought three individually. So, why would anyone buy a pack of three instead of 3 individual ones? Because the individual ones are always out of stock.Breville's decision to run their business like this is frustrating. I love the oven, but I do not trust and do not like Breville because of this one decision some jerk made in the head office.These baskets are exactly what you think they are because one came with your oven. The pricing scam is annoying as hell.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect for Brevelle Air Fryer Pro
reviews.reviewText: Perfectly fits my Brevelle Air Fryer Pro (BOV900BSS1BCA1).I bought these additional racks to airfry 2-3 items at the same time for meal-prep.These racks really are stainless steel and are well built, they do not bend/flex even after being heat-cycled.Given that the racks use a diamond-mesh basket design, oil, gunk and residue gets trapped into the mesh.This makes it somewhat difficult to clean. However a pipe-cleaner brush or water-bottle cleaning brush does the trick.I recommend buying these when they go on sale since they're a bit pricey.

These are worth getting as it greatly increases your capacity to cook more things at the same time. Years later they are still in great shape, dishwasher safe. I air fried potatoes and eggplants on three trays at the same time and they all turned out great. I got these in 2019 and it’s 2023.
I'm happy with my purchase. The racks are the same great quality I have come to expect from Breville . I use these racks to dry fruit and veg in my Breville smart oven, they work great.
